Html:
My X axis is HorizontalDateTimeAxis

I tried to show hours/minutes in the crosshair values using this:

<ddd:CursorCoordinateGraph CustomXFormat='{}{0:HH:mm}' />

but it didn't work (the X values are coming in some decimal form like 38.1)

Whats the correct way to do it?
Apparently this already has been answered here: https://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/discussions/285624
